parameters.name: AssemblyLevelToUpdate
parameters.description: Level in which to update SOLIDWORKS Toolbox components as defined in swAssemblyLevelToUpdate_e

title: IAssemblyDoc.UpdateToolboxComponent
description: Updates SOLIDWORKS Toolbox components in the specified assembly level using the current information in Toolbox settings.

parameters.name: AssemblyLevelToUpdate
parameters.description: Level in which to update SOLIDWORKS Toolbox components as defined in swAssemblyLevelToUpdate_e

returns: Status of updating the SOLIDWORKS Toolbox components as defined in swAssemblyUpdateToolboxComponentStatus_e
